description.content:
## Headers

# This is a Heading h1
## This is a Heading h2 
###### This is a Heading h6

## Emphasis

*This text will be italicised*  
_This will also be italicised_

**This text will be bold**  
__This will also be bold__

_You **can** combine them_

## Lists

### Unordered

* Item 1
* Item 2
  * Item 2a
  * Item 2b

### Ordered

1. Item 1
1. Item 2
    1. Indented
    1. Indented

## Blockquotes

> Blockquotes
>
>> Nested blockquotes

## Tables

| Left align  | Middle align | Right align |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -------------: |
| left foo      | middle foo     | right foo |
| left bar      | middle bar     | right bar |

## Images

![Image alt text](/images/nonexistent.png "Image title")

## Links

Check our our [Knowledge Base](https://help.deskdirector.com/category/zfeu2fiqyt-task-lists).

## Video (Youtube, Vimeo, .mp4)
![youtube.com](https://youtu.be/LRwZu2RQyd8)

## Inline code

Type `cd ..` in the terminal to go up one directory.

## Blocks of code

```
let message = 'Hello world';
alert(message);
```
